painless.recipes

Caramel Cake

@atmaturen

Cake

  • 2 cups cake flour
  • 1/2 cup of butter
  • 2 eggs
  • 1 teaspoon baking soda
  • 1 1/4 cup brown sugar
  • 1 cup of milk
  • 3oz chocolate
  • 1 teaspoon vanilla

1.Mix the flour with the salt and soda 2.Break the butter into little pieces, add sugar and mix until it is creamy 3.Add one egg at a time 4.Melt the chocolate in a cup over some steam, then add it to the butter/sugar/egg mixture 5. Add vanilla and mix well 6. Bake in two 9" plates at 350F for 25 minute 7. Cover with the caramel icing

Filling

  • 4 eggs
  • 6 tablespoon lemon juice
  • 2 cups sugar
  • 4 tablespoon flour
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt
  • Powdered sugar
  1. Mix all ingredients and pour onto baked crust.
  2. Bake 25 minutes at 350 degrees.
  3. Sprinkle with powdered sugar while still warm.
